name: pern
description: Postgres Express React/Redux/React-Router-DOM Node stack boilerplate
author: Victor Li

scripts.prod: npx babel server -d dist --copy-files && cd client && yarn build && cd .. && node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
scripts.server: nodemon --ignore client/ --exec npx babel-node -r node_modules/dotenv/config server/index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npx babel server -d dist --copy-files && cd client && yarn && yarn run build
